original: 沛國人，丁儀之弟。頗有文采，和兄長丁儀都與曹植交好，並支持他與曹丕競爭，因而被曹丕記恨，曹丕即位之後丁家旋即被滅族。
text: Peiguo, the younger brother of Ding Yi. Quite a literary talent, and his elder brother Ding Yi had a good relationship with Cao Zhi, and supported him to compete with Cao Pi, so he was hated by Cao Pi, after Cao Pi ascended the throne, Ding Jia was immediately annihilated.
